answerText: : week of peace [or sacred week; prompt on week][10] The week of peace is an actual Igbo tradition chronicled in this novel about Okonkwo, written by Chinua Achebe.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Maryland B + Loyola  | 7 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: A kola nut offering to Ezeani proves to be insufficient to atone for a violent act during this time period. For 10 points each: [10] Name this time period where villagers take a rest from their work and drink palm wine. Its sanctity is violated by a man beating up his younger wife Ojiugo.
